title: Prospective Student Application Status Inquiry
description: A prospective student calls to check the status of their undergraduate application.

tasks.description: Retrieve the student's application using their name and date of birth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the applicant's record.

tasks.description: Check the current status of the application in the student information system (SIS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the application status is 'Under Review'.

tasks.description: Inform the student of their application status and provide the expected decision date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the status and timeline.
